resources.string: Search for songs or input your own lyrics
Select an excerpt from the lyric, up to 15 words, and hit Copy.
Try again with a different lyric
Input full password as it appears here:
Put the lyrics in the correct order by dragging and dropping the word boxes below:
Now, similarly, put the characters of your new password in the correct order. Are you up to the challenge?
Select the right password from the list. Hint: sing the lyric to yourself to remember!
Now... Do you think you\'re ready to use your new password? Input the correct characters, this time no hints!
